snippet: Videos that appeared to portray inmates using drugs and alcohol — and handling a firearm — were shown in court as part of a suit over parish prison reforms.
abstract: Lawyers and onlookers are stunned by video showing inmates at Orleans Parish Prison using drugs, drinking and brandishing loaded pistol; video is played as part of hearing to determine with federal consent decree is warranted to reform the New Orleans jail.
lead_paragraph: Videos that appeared to portray inmates using drugs and alcohol — and handling a firearm — were shown in court as part of a suit over parish prison reforms.

headline.main: New Orleans Jail Videos Bring Shock at Hearing
headline.print_headline: New Orleans Jail Videos Bring Shock At Hearing
